c0b401df-59df-4fa5-be67-a42f77c9c58b.description: Smartsheet Aligned Solution Professional is the first level of the Aligned Technical Certification program. Certification is based on candidates taking a passing on-line testing a demonstration of implementation skills by building SCC customer solution. This follows the first stage of training and education in the creation, and implementation of solutions within Smartsheet software. Available to Smartsheet Aligned Partners only.
c0b401df-59df-4fa5-be67-a42f77c9c58b.name: Smartsheet Aligned Certified Solution Professional

issuer.summary: issued by Smartsheet Aligned Partner Network

badge_template_activities.title: The award consists of two stages; first stage is an 80% pass mark on an online test, where the candidate is asked various questions around Smartsheet core platform and other Smartsheet solutions, these questions are at an implementation level. On successful completion of this test the candidate is then asked to take part in a Single Blueprint Control Center Challenge. They will need to build a Smartsheet customer solution within SCC. 80% score or above is required

32e1cc5b-7049-4c34-8252-3747287747c3.description: Smartsheet Aligned Partner Program certification for first level Sales professionals. Available for Smartsheet Partners only. This is where you are given the basics on how to position Smartsheet to customers and the general market in which you operate. It builds upon basic product knowledge and allows for the successful placing and selling of the product as a result.
32e1cc5b-7049-4c34-8252-3747287747c3.name: Smartsheet Aligned Certified Sales Professional

issuer.summary: issued by Smartsheet Aligned Partner Network

badge_template_activities.title: Smartsheet Aligned Certified Sales Professional

3f360ec9-cac0-4748-94c4-4224b9a62b3c.description: This is the entry level partner tier for our Solution Partner Program. Partners start at this level and can proceed to higher tier levels Gold and Platinum. They will have multiple certified individuals both in Sales and Technical disciplines and are likely to have experienced team members that have delivered multiple customer projects with a degree of complexity.
3f360ec9-cac0-4748-94c4-4224b9a62b3c.name: Smartsheet Aligned Silver Solution Partner

issuer.summary: issued by Smartsheet Aligned Partner Network

badge_template_activities.title: Solution partners are evaluated against several metrics across three categories: Performance, Capabilities and Partnership. Performance assess partner's annual recurring revenue, growth rates and deal registration figures. Capabilities assess partner's product, sales and technical skills. Partnership assess a partner's alignment with Smartsheet's goals and objectives, portfolio and ability to deliver positive customer outcomes.

fcc08631-c558-45a3-b554-686394a87449.description: This is the top level partner tier for our Solution Partner Program. Partners at this level will need to work towards maintaining this level through generating licence revenue, delivering exceptional CSAT scores and maintaining and developing their certified team members. They will have multiple certified individuals both in Sales and Technical disciplines and are likely to have experienced team members that have delivered multiple customer projects with a high degree of complexity.
fcc08631-c558-45a3-b554-686394a87449.name: Smartsheet Aligned Platinum Solution Partner

issuer.summary: issued by Smartsheet Aligned Partner Network

badge_template_activities.title: Partners are assessed across three core areas; performance and revenue generated; amount of licence revenue generated. Capabilities and certifications awarded; skills, knowledge and capabilities of partners team members and certifications awarded. Customer success and feedback; delivery of customer projects that drive customer success by getting feedback from customers.

2c5e3905-0c0f-4faf-be00-1a65c3a8f92b.description: Smartsheet Aligned Partner Program certification for second level Solution Consultant. Intermediate level of understanding and ability in the creation and development of solution for Smartsheet software that allow customers and end users to more efficiently and effectively problem solve. Available for Smartsheet Partners only.
2c5e3905-0c0f-4faf-be00-1a65c3a8f92b.name: Smartsheet Aligned Certified Solution Consultant

issuer.summary: issued by Smartsheet Aligned Partner Network

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates will need to hold active Smartsheet Aligned Certified Solution Professional credential.

Individuals that hold this credential have been been through a two stage assessment; stage 1 20 question timed multiple choice on-line exam; stage 2 live assessment of Solution Consultant Solution Challenge - design and deliver customer solution to Smartsheet panel. Candidate will need to have achieved 80% passmark in each stage to be awarded certification

310ede0c-eaf3-4fcc-a858-fba2456f593d.description: This is the second level partner in our Aligned Partner Program, partners can proceed from here to Platinum. They will have multiple certified individuals both in Sales and Technical disciplines and are likely to have experienced team members that have delivered multiple customer projects with a degree of complexity.
